First, Vivek picks a positive integer greater than 1. On the next move, Margret picks a number not divisible by Vivek’s number. On the next move, Vivek has to pick a number that cannot be expressed as a sum of numbers which have already been picked (not neccessarily distinct sum!), and so on.
